oai_dc:dc.dc:title: James Geddes Fire Engine Company No. 6, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the James Geddes Engine Company No. 6, located at 627 2nd Avenue South not dated. The two-story structure was originally built in the late 19th century around 1885. The former Fire Hall was named for James Geddes, a civil engineer for the Louisville and Nashville Railroad. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
